@ReshKhan_ I’ve been there a couple of times in the dead of night, particularly in the deep throes of grief. I’ve since built that closeness with a few folk & learned from friends that @samaritans are always there, even if you’re not suicidal or majorly in drama, they offer a connection. X

@MoaningMama I’m so sorry to read this. You are handling it with such integrity, grace & wisdom. I really appreciate your honesty; you’re modelling how it’s good & right to do what feels best in times of trauma when we know our thinking is coming from an honest, self-loving place. X

@Bobbins_K @chiller @sioncorn @typejunky Ah yes - vegans here like their fake Shwarma.
@sioncorn @typejunky @chiller I was completely sold there 😂

@chiller @typejunky @sioncorn That is really interesting. I can eat tinned baked beans - was told something to do with the superheating process kills the enzyme that sets off anaphylaxis - but can’t even breathe cooking vapour from non tinned beans without reacting.
@sioncorn @typejunky @chiller This sounds very like my last diet - 14 years old - ‘I’m just going to eat white toast and microwave fried eggs’. Because health.
@typejunky @sioncorn @chiller Omg that’s horrific :-(
@sioncorn @typejunky @chiller Shiiiit. I’m allergic (anaphylactic) to legumes & nuts. Intolerant to fresh tomatoes and bananas (both fine if cooked - kills the enzyme that bothers me, apparently).
@sioncorn @typejunky @chiller 😂😂😂 Yeah I had a tiny bit of them on pizza once and almost had to be taken home on a string, like a fricking (screaming) kite. Horror show. 😭😂😭
@typejunky @sioncorn @chiller Oooow!
@sioncorn @typejunky @chiller Aye, those LM burgers are fab. 👌🏼
@typejunky @sioncorn @chiller As in allergy or explosive?
@sioncorn @typejunky @chiller I had the same with artichokes. Lethal.
